Parnassus' Priestess Fioren:
The Wind Spirits from the Storm Isle are now wreking havoc all over Innadril.
We need the help of experienced adventurers to deal with them. Pick a location and put all the unruly Wind Spirits there to rest.
To travel to the Storm Isle, go through the Eastern Entrance.
To travel to the Isle of Prayer, go through the Southern Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 110+.
To travel to the Alligator Island, go through the Western Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 115+.
To travel to the Frost Island, go through the Northern Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 120+.
